title: Internet Disconnecting ONLY whilst in game on league
body: Hi Riot, i have played league from the end of S3 and have enjoyed it so far, i achieved lvl30 early in s3 and got placed in a low elo, this was completely fair, however this season i was placed in b5 again because of the bad teams i have gotted, but this isnt the reason that im complaining, in my last few matches at night i have been a few minutes into my game and i get attempting to reconnect and my internet connection on both Ethernet and wifi (have tried both), shows limited and i have no internet access. i have tried alot of things and it just doesnt go away, i really need help, also i have gotten into 20 minutes low priority which has pissed me off a little bit but that isnt that much of an issue, please please please help me riot :)

replies.body: i have avast antivirus but it was fine for a year b4hand so it wouldnt be that also my lap[top has it and nothing happens on that... so yeah

I have had similar problem when in loading screen i will not be able to enter game then when i close and reconnect it only comes up with a blank screen with a message sayng no internet connection please try again. i have to do this for up to 10 times before i am able to connect and im connected to the internet as this happens

>because of the bad teams i have gotted

[snickering intensifies]

Your problem might be arising from a memory leak, which is really weird. Do you have any anti-virus/firewall programs in place?
